text: allah vetin ovunta ek dharmayak pahala viya. eya ovun veta æti dharmaya satyaya karada tabanneya. mita pera nam, ovun pratiksepa karannan mata (tamanta) jayagrahanaya laba dena men (mema dharmaye mahimaya magin deviyan vahanse veta) prarthana karamin sitiyaha. namut ovun hondin dæna (pæminevi yayi bala) siti (mema dharmaya) ovun veta pæmini avasthavedi, meya ovun pratiksepa karannaha. ebævin ema pratiksepa karannan mata allahge sapaya at veva
